definition: an orthopedic mechanical device used to immobilize and protect a part of the body (as a broken leg), support with a splint
details:
noun
- an orthopedic mechanical device used to immobilize and protect a part of the body (as a broken leg)
- a thin sliver of wood
= example: a thin sliver of wood
verb
- support with a splint
= example: support with a splint
